scripting
Class Binding

java.lang.Object
  scripting.Binding

public class Binding
extends java.lang.Object

A class which is used by JLWidget implementations to communicate with their internal state.

Author:
Curran Kelleher

Binding

public Binding(Function getterFunction,
               Function setterFunction)
Create a new JLWidgetBinding object for the given parameters

Parameters:
getterFunction - the getter function (for the internal state of the widget) in the specified language
setterFunction - the setter function (for the internal state of the widget) in the specified language
Method Detail

setInternalState

public void setInternalState(java.lang.Object externalState)
Sets the internal state to be the same as the external state by executing a script.

Parameters:
externalState - the current external state of the widget

getInternalState

public java.lang.Object getInternalState()
Gets the internal state by means of evaluating the getter function

Returns:
the internal state

getInternalStateAs

public java.lang.Object getInternalStateAs(java.lang.Class type)
Gets the internal state by means of evaluating the getter function

Parameters:
type - the type to coerce the result into
Returns:
the internal state, coerced to the specified type

createBinding

public static Binding createBinding(java.lang.Object bean,
                                    java.lang.String propertyName)
Generates a binding which uses bean property getter and setter functions of a Java bean

Parameters:
bean - the java object with the getter and setter functions called "get"+propertyName and "set"+propertyName.
propertyName - the name of the bean property
